Description: Production-grade web application infrastructure with ALB, Auto Scaling, RDS, and monitoring

EnvironmentSuffix.Description: Suffix for resource names to support parallel deployments (e.g., PR number)
EnvironmentSuffix.ConstraintDescription: Must contain only alphanumeric characters and hyphens

SNSEmailAddress.Description: Email address for CloudWatch alarm notifications

SourceAmiIdSsmParameter.Description: SSM parameter name holding the AMI ID (keeps template free of hard-coded AMI IDs)

ALBSecurityGroupId.Description: Application Load Balancer Security Group ID

DBSecretArn.Description: RDS database master password secret ARN

ALBHostedZoneId.Description: Application Load Balancer hosted zone ID

SNSTopicArn.Description: SNS Topic ARN for CloudWatch alarms

WebAppLogGroupName.Description: CloudWatch Log Group name for web application

WebAppLogGroupArn.Description: CloudWatch Log Group ARN for web application

DatabaseConnectionString.Description: Database connection string template (password from Secrets Manager)

Region.Description: AWS Region where stack is deployed
